changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.comment: Create an account for MSI based authentication when running on Azure
changeSet.sql: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.database_principals WHERE name = N'${fffsWebPortalStagingDbMsiUsername}') CREATE USER [${fffsWebPortalStagingDbMsiUsername}] FROM EXTERNAL PROVIDER

rollback.sql: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.database_principals WHERE name = N'${fffsWebPortalStagingDbMsiUsername}') DROP USER [${fffsWebPortalStagingDbMsiUsername}]
